### National Power Flight Academy

**2024 \| Fremont, Nebraska**\
*9 Flight Hours • Solo Wings Certified*

Comprehensive flight training in aerodynamics and aircraft systems. Completed solo flight with hands-on pre-flight checks, takeoff, landing procedures. Direct pathway toward Private Pilot Certificate with demonstrated proficiency in aircraft handling and decision-making under instruction.
:::

### Aircraft Manufacturing Academy

**2025 \| Wichita, Kansas**\
*Aerospace Manufacturing & Engineering*

Specialized training in aircraft systems, manufacturing processes, and aerospace engineering. Hands-on technical projects exploring production workflows and assembly techniques. Manufacturing facility tours with aerospace engineering professionals. Broadened career perspective to include engineering and manufacturing roles.
:::

### Specialized Undergraduate Pilot Training (SUPT-FC)

**2025 \| Columbus Air Force Base, Mississippi**\
*Competitive National Selection*

Selected from competitive national pool for advanced pilot training at active U.S. Air Force base. Direct exposure to U.S. Air Force pilot operations and advanced flight systems. Networked with Air Force pilots and experienced active-duty military culture. Reinforced commitment to U.S. Air Force pilot career pathway.
:::

### CyberPatriot Academy

**2023–2025 \| Advanced Cyber Defense**\
*Multi-Year Program*

Multi-year advanced cybersecurity program covering systems security hardening and network defense strategies. Cyber defense competition preparation with hands-on defense exercises. Competitive edge in CyberPatriot competitions and national cyber security standing.
